verses.verse: I <S%H6960>waited<s%> <S%H6960>patiently<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> He <S%H5186>turned<s%> to <S%H8085>me,<s%> and heard my <S%H7775>cry.<s%>

He brought me <S%H5927>up<s%> also out of a <S%H7588>horrible<s%> <S%H953>pit,<s%> out of the <S%H3121>miry<s%> <S%H2916>clay.<s%> He <S%H6965>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> on a <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and gave me a firm <S%H3559>place<s%> to <S%H838>stand.<s%>

He has <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> even <S%H8416>praise<s%> to our <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H7227>Many<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3372>it,<s%> and fear, and shall <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> who <S%H7760>makes<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H4009>trust,<s%> and <S%H6437>doesn't<s%> respect the <S%H7295>proud,<s%> nor such as turn <S%H7750>aside<s%> to <S%H3577>lies.<s%>

<S%H7227>Many,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> are the <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> works which you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> and your <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> which are toward <S%H5046>us.<s%> They can't be declared back to <S%H5046>you.<s%> If I would declare and <S%H1696>speak<s%> of <S%H6105>them,<s%> they are more than can be <S%H5608>numbered.<s%>

<S%H2077>Sacrifice<s%> and <S%H4503>offering<s%> you <S%H2654>didn't<s%> desire. You have <S%H3738>opened<s%> my <S%H241>ears.<s%> You have not <S%H7592>required<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and sin <S%H2401>offering.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>"Behold,<s%> I have come. It is <S%H3789>written<s%> about me in the <S%H5612>book<s%> in the <S%H4039>scroll.<s%>
I <S%H2654>delight<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> your <S%H7522>will,<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H8451>Yes,<s%> your law is <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H4578>heart.<s%>"

I have <S%H1319>proclaimed<s%> glad news of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly.<s%> <S%H3607>Behold,<s%> I will not seal my <S%H8193>lips,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H3045>know.<s%>

I have not <S%H3680>hidden<s%> your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H3820>heart.<s%> I have <S%H559>declared<s%> your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and your <S%H8668>salvation.<s%> I have not <S%H3582>concealed<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> from the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

<S%H3607>Don't<s%> withhold your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> from <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh. Let your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and your <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> preserve <S%H5341>me.<s%>

For <S%H4557>innumerable<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> have <S%H661>surrounded<s%> <S%H5771>me.<s%> My iniquities have <S%H5381>overtaken<s%> <S%H3201>me,<s%> so that I am not able to look <S%H7200>up.<s%> They are <S%H6105>more<s%> than the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of my <S%H7218>head.<s%> My <S%H3820>heart<s%> has failed <S%H5800>me.<s%>

Let them be <S%H954>disappointed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> <S%H5472>it.<s%> Let them be turned <S%H268>backward<s%> and brought to <S%H3637>dishonor<s%> who <S%H2655>delight<s%> in my <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>
Let them be <S%H8074>desolate<s%> by <S%H6118>reason<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> that <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1889>me,<s%> "Aha! <S%H1889>Aha!<s%>"

Let all those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> you <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in <S%H157>you.<s%> Let such as love your <S%H8668>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> "Let <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be <S%H1431>exalted!<s%>"

But I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%> May the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H2803>think<s%> about <S%H5833>me.<s%> You are my help and my <S%H6403>deliverer.<s%> <S%H309>Don't<s%> delay, my <S%H430>God.<s%>
